text: Edirne Province is in East Thrace at Turkey. Its capital city is Edirne. It borders on Greece to the west, Bulgaria to the north and the provinces of Kırklareli and Tekirdağ to the east. The license plate number is 22.https://www.researchgate.net/figure/Study-area-the-edirne-province- turkey_fig1_286939289 == References ==
title: Edirne Province
